Class dnx.jack.MotionBehavior 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----dnx.jack.Behavior
           |
           +----dnx.jack.MotionBehavior
public class MotionBehavior
extends Behavior
The MotionBehavior class is the base class of all Behaviors that produce motion in jack.
Author:
Patrick Schmitz

CENTER_base
Sets Center basis for paths, positions, etc.
LL_base
Sets Lower-Left corner coordniate basis for paths, positions, etc.
LR_base
Sets Lower-Right corner coordniate basis for paths, positions, etc.
UL_base
Sets Upper-Left corner coordniate basis for paths, positions, etc.
UR_base
Sets Upper-Right corner coordniate basis for paths, positions, etc.

MotionBehavior()
Constructs a default MotionBehavior with name "Unknown".
MotionBehavior(String)
Constructs a default MotionBehavior with a name.

Returns the basic behavior class (i.e.
getCoordinateBase()
This provides access to the coordinate base.
setCoordinateBase(int)
This provides access to the coordinate base.
translate(int, int, int)
This provides a means for motion behaviors that are regular in pattern to be translated onscreen within the TEA editor.

UL_base 
  public final static int UL_base
Sets Upper-Left corner coordniate basis for paths, positions, etc. (Default)
LL_base 
  public final static int LL_base
Sets Lower-Left corner coordniate basis for paths, positions, etc.
LR_base 
  public final static int LR_base
Sets Lower-Right corner coordniate basis for paths, positions, etc.
UR_base 
  public final static int UR_base
Sets Upper-Right corner coordniate basis for paths, positions, etc.
CENTER_base 
  public final static int CENTER_base
Sets Center basis for paths, positions, etc. This uses the passed maximum dimensions as the basis for the position. This is a good bet for objects that dramatically change size, but requires that each image in an image sequence be centered...

MotionBehavior 
  public MotionBehavior()
Constructs a default MotionBehavior with name "Unknown".
MotionBehavior 
  public MotionBehavior(String name)
Constructs a default MotionBehavior with a name.

setCoordinateBase 
  public void setCoordinateBase(int base)
This provides access to the coordinate base. Subclasses can override this to ensure notification of changes.
Parameters:
base - the new coordinate base.
getCoordinateBase 
  public int getCoordinateBase()
This provides access to the coordinate base.
translate 
  public void translate(int x,
                        int y,
                        int z)
This provides a means for motion behaviors that are regular in pattern to be translated onscreen within the TEA editor. Subclasses can override this to take notification of dragging.
Parameters:
x - the x translation
y - the y translation
z - the z translation
getBehaviorClass 
  public final Class getBehaviorClass()
Returns the basic behavior class (i.e. the immediate subclass of Behavior). This is abstract, so that only a Behavior subclass can return this. Only immediate subclasses of Behavior should implement this.
Overrides:
getBehaviorClass in class Behavior
